actions.name: AcceptMatch
actions.description: Grants permission to register player acceptance or rejection of a proposed FlexMatch match

actions.name: ClaimGameServer
actions.description: Grants permission to locate and reserve a game server to host a new game session

actions.name: CreateAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to define a new alias for a fleet

actions.name: CreateBuild
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new game build using files stored in an Amazon S3 bucket

actions.name: CreateContainerGroupDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new container group definition for a container fleet

actions.name: CreateFleet
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new fleet of computing resources to run your game servers

actions.name: CreateFleetLocations
actions.description: Grants permission to specify additional locations for a fleet

actions.name: CreateGameServerGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new game server group, set up a corresponding Auto Scaling group, and launche instances to host game servers

actions.name: CreateGameSession
actions.description: Grants permission to start a new game session on a specified fleet

actions.name: CreateGameSessionQueue
actions.description: Grants permission to set up a new queue for processing game session placement requests

actions.name: CreateLocation
actions.description: Grants permission to define a new location for a fleet

actions.name: CreateMatchmakingConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new FlexMatch matchmaker

actions.name: CreateMatchmakingRuleSet
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new matchmaking rule set for FlexMatch

actions.name: CreatePlayerSession
actions.description: Grants permission to reserve an available game session slot for a player

actions.name: CreatePlayerSessions
actions.description: Grants permission to reserve available game session slots for multiple players

actions.name: CreateScript
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new Realtime Servers script

actions.name: CreateVpcPeeringAuthorization
actions.description: Grants permission to allow GameLift to create or delete a peering connection between a GameLift fleet VPC and a VPC on another AWS account

actions.name: CreateVpcPeeringConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to establish a peering connection between your GameLift fleet VPC and a VPC on another account

actions.name: DeleteAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an alias

actions.name: DeleteBuild
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a game build

actions.name: DeleteContainerGroupDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a container group definition that is not being used in a fleet

actions.name: DeleteFleet
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an empty fleet

actions.name: DeleteFleetLocations
actions.description: Grants permission to delete locations for a fleet

actions.name: DeleteGameServerGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to permanently delete a game server group and terminate FleetIQ activity for the corresponding Auto Scaling group

actions.name: DeleteGameSessionQueue
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing game session queue

actions.name: DeleteLocation
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a location

actions.name: DeleteMatchmakingConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing FlexMatch matchmaker

actions.name: DeleteMatchmakingRuleSet
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing FlexMatch matchmaking rule set

actions.name: DeleteScalingPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a set of auto-scaling rules

actions.name: DeleteScript
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a Realtime Servers script

actions.name: DeleteVpcPeeringAuthorization
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel a VPC peering authorization

actions.name: DeleteVpcPeeringConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a peering connection between VPCs

actions.name: DeregisterCompute
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister a compute against a fleet

actions.name: DeregisterGameServer
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a game server from a game server group

actions.name: DescribeAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for an alias

actions.name: DescribeBuild
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for a game build

actions.name: DescribeCompute
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve general properties of the compute such as ARN, fleet details, SDK endpoints, and location

actions.name: DescribeContainerGroupDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve general properties, including status, for a container group definition

actions.name: DescribeEC2InstanceLimits
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the maximum allowed and current usage for EC2 instance types

actions.name: DescribeFleetAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve general properties, including status, for fleets

actions.name: DescribeFleetCapacity
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current capacity setting for fleets

actions.name: DescribeFleetEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve entries from a fleet's event log

actions.name: DescribeFleetLocationAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve general properties, including statuses, for a fleet's locations

actions.name: DescribeFleetLocationCapacity
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current capacity setting for a fleet's location

actions.name: DescribeFleetLocationUtilization
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve utilization statistics for fleet's location

actions.name: DescribeFleetPortSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the inbound connection permissions for a fleet

actions.name: DescribeFleetUtilization
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve utilization statistics for fleets

actions.name: DescribeGameServer
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for a game server

actions.name: DescribeGameServerGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for a game server group

actions.name: DescribeGameServerInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the status of EC2 instances in a game server group

actions.name: DescribeGameSessionDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for game sessions in a fleet, including the protection policy

actions.name: DescribeGameSessionPlacement
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details of a game session placement request

actions.name: DescribeGameSessionQueues
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for game session queues

actions.name: DescribeGameSessions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for game sessions in a fleet

actions.name: DescribeInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about instances in a fleet

actions.name: DescribeMatchmaking
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details of matchmaking tickets

actions.name: DescribeMatchmakingConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for FlexMatch matchmakers

actions.name: DescribeMatchmakingRuleSets
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for FlexMatch matchmaking rule sets

actions.name: DescribePlayerSessions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for player sessions in a game session

actions.name: DescribeRuntimeConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current runtime configuration for a fleet

actions.name: DescribeScalingPolicies
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all scaling policies that are applied to a fleet

actions.name: DescribeScript
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for a Realtime Servers script

actions.name: DescribeVpcPeeringAuthorizations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve valid VPC peering authorizations

actions.name: DescribeVpcPeeringConnections
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details on active or pending VPC peering connections

actions.name: GetComputeAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve access credentials of the compute

actions.name: GetComputeAuthToken
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an authorization token for a compute and fleet to use in game server processes

actions.name: GetGameSessionLogUrl
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the location of stored logs for a game session

actions.name: GetInstanceAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to request remote access to a specified fleet instance

actions.name: ListAliases
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all aliases that are defined in the current Region

actions.name: ListBuilds
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all game build in the current Region

actions.name: ListCompute
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all compute resources in the current Region

actions.name: ListContainerGroupDefinitions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of names for all container group definitions in the current Region

actions.name: ListFleets
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of fleet IDs for all fleets in the current Region

actions.name: ListGameServerGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all game server groups that are defined in the current Region

actions.name: ListGameServers
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all game servers that are currently running in a game server group

actions.name: ListLocations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all locations in this account

actions.name: ListScripts
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve properties for all Realtime Servers scripts in the current region

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve tags for GameLift resources

actions.name: PutScalingPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update a fleet auto-scaling policy

actions.name: RegisterCompute
actions.description: Grants permission to register a compute against a fleet

actions.name: RegisterGameServer
actions.description: Grants permission to notify GameLift FleetIQ when a new game server is ready to host gameplay

actions.name: RequestUploadCredentials
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve fresh upload credentials to use when uploading a new game build

actions.name: ResolveAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the fleet ID associated with an alias

actions.name: ResumeGameServerGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to reinstate suspended FleetIQ activity for a game server group

actions.name: SearchGameSessions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve game sessions that match a set of search criteria

actions.name: StartFleetActions
actions.description: Grants permission to resume auto-scaling activity on a fleet after it was suspended with StopFleetActions()

actions.name: StartGameSessionPlacement
actions.description: Grants permission to send a game session placement request to a game session queue

actions.name: StartMatchBackfill
actions.description: Grants permission to request FlexMatch matchmaking to fill available player slots in an existing game session

actions.name: StartMatchmaking
actions.description: Grants permission to request FlexMatch matchmaking for one or a group of players and initiate game session placement

actions.name: StopFleetActions
actions.description: Grants permission to suspend auto-scaling activity on a fleet

actions.name: StopGameSessionPlacement
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel a game session placement request that is in progress

actions.name: StopMatchmaking
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel a matchmaking or match backfill request that is in progress

actions.name: SuspendGameServerGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to temporarily stop FleetIQ activity for a game server group

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag GameLift resources

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to untag GameLift resources

actions.name: UpdateAlias
actions.description: Grants permission to update the properties of an existing alias

actions.name: UpdateBuild
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing build's metadata

actions.name: UpdateFleetAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to update the general properties of an existing fleet

actions.name: UpdateFleetCapacity
actions.description: Grants permission to adjust a fleet's capacity settings

actions.name: UpdateFleetPortSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to adjust a fleet's port settings

actions.name: UpdateGameServer
actions.description: Grants permission to change game server properties, health status, or utilization status

actions.name: UpdateGameServerGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to update properties for game server group, including allowed instance types

actions.name: UpdateGameSession
actions.description: Grants permission to update the properties of an existing game session

actions.name: UpdateGameSessionQueue
actions.description: Grants permission to update properties of an existing game session queue

actions.name: UpdateMatchmakingConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update properties of an existing FlexMatch matchmaking configuration

actions.name: UpdateRuntimeConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update how server processes are configured on instances in an existing fleet

actions.name: UpdateScript
actions.description: Grants permission to update the metadata and content of an existing Realtime Servers script

actions.name: ValidateMatchmakingRuleSet
actions.description: Grants permission to validate the syntax of a FlexMatch matchmaking rule set
